basics.name: David Aizenberg
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer with six years of technical experience, with a heavy focus on back-end and operations. Extensive hands-on experience with building robust and scalable systems & automation.

skills.name: System Administration
keywords: Software Management and Packaging (deb packages, snapcraft, init systems)
CI/CD and Configuration Management (CircleCI, Drone.io, Ansible)
Troubleshooting and Tracing (ftrace, strace, tcpdump, perf)
Containers and Orchestration (docker, docker-compose, lxd, terraform)
Load Balancing and Caching Proxies (nginx, haproxy, traefik)
Log and dump analysis (awk, sed, grep)

skills.name: Software Development
keywords: Maintenance of legacy code bases (php, js, python)

work.summary: Development and support of various internal applications, management of a remote team
highlights: Introduction of modern software development practices into the team workflow
Breaking up of a monolithic application into lean microservice based architecture
On premise and cloud infrastructure maintenance

work.summary: Development of Software as a Service product. Including choice of technology stack, platform, setting up infrastructure, and developing new features
highlights: Full Stack Development of SaaS product with MEAN Stack and Meteor framework
Code Reviews and management of working students

work.summary: Deployment and maintenance of servers, personal computers and peripheral devices
highlights: Ongoing maintenance, updates and assistance with Linux, Windows and Mac OS X workstations
Deployment and maintenance of Linux Servers
Introduction and implementation of basic security measures, such as firewalls, private networks
